ensemble_analysis_lib.score_akld_t(traj_ref: Trajectory, traj_hat: Trajectory, n_bins: int = 50, method: str = 'js')[source]

Similar to ‘score_akld_d’, but evaluate alpha torsion angles.

ensemble_analysis_lib.score_jsd_approximation(v_true, v_pred, n_bins=50, pseudo_c=0.001)[source]

Scores an approximation of JS by discretizing the values in ‘v_true’ (data points from a reference distribution) and ‘v_pred’ (data points from a predicted distribution).

ensemble_analysis_lib.score_kld_approximation(v_true, v_pred, n_bins=50, pseudo_c=0.001)[source]

Scores an approximation of KLD by discretizing the values in ‘v_true’ (data points from a reference distribution) and ‘v_pred’ (data points from a predicted distribution).

ensemble_analysis_lib.transform(features, model, method='pca')[source]
ensemble_analysis_lib.unit_vector_distance(a0, a1)[source]

Compute the sum of distances between two (*, N, 2) arrays storing the sine and cosine values of N angles.

ensemble_analysis_lib.unit_vectorize(a)[source]

Convert an array with (, N) angles in an array with (, N, 2) sine and cosine values for the N angles.
